text: Touching Down is the first solo studio album by the drum and bass DJ Roni Size. It was released in 2002 by Full Cycle Records. ==Critical reception== CMJ New Music Monthly wrote that while "Size still rocks harder than most junglists, he rarely vaults over the genre's limitations here." Billboard called it a "fluid set that moves from track to track with little or no delineation." == Track listing == ==References== Category:2002 debut albums Category:Roni Size albums
title: Touching Down
